price: 32. Mpe (moto) nyoso, akotelema liboso na biso (тропа kosamba).
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
